text:
ğŸ‘ to â€œGMs. This is just a reminder. When you guys get an isowction wether is the health dept or ecosure and you are not at the store , it's your responsibility to get there as soon as possible , that is you JOB When you call me MUST BE WHEN YOU ARE ON YOUR WAY TO THE STORE ALREADY ! Do not have the mentality that your team has it . Bennion had ecosure on Thursday and almost failed the visit on none critical violations
They missed the following
Fs 10 for 5 points
Fs 3 for 3 points
Fs 17 for 3 points
Fs 20 for 3 points their score was 86 this is way close to failing .
- an employee again , touching her face and continuing to cook without washing hands
- the dishwasher not sanitizing the dishes , this should have been caught in the 2 pm food safety check
- open packages of food not covered in the freezer. Iam assuming it was the apple pies
- glass cleaner stored in a drinking cup in the utility closet . Unlabeled
This visit was scary close again for stupid things that should be followed up on by you and your dept mgrs.
Armandoâ€
